TopicTitle: Let us spawn Asteroids with custom installation...

Articles.Content:
As the title says, i am thinking about creating a new large mission in MH, and i stumbled about the fact that we are not supposed to spawn asteroids in the missionbuilder SPH/VAB and attach a installation like a habitat or whatever ship or mechanic to it, and put it to a custom orbit around any body...

Would be great... can you hear me, @SQUAD ? 

I am aware that the claw cannot be attached to any part in the SPH/ VAB, but we could attach any other back in the days when the potatoroid was accessible by a glitch (and put it up with Alt+F12...). 

Edited March 9, 2019 by Mikki
